overview: A week before Independence Day, Elad’s entire world is falling apart. A breakup urges him to move out and find a new place, On the balcony above “Occupiers Street,” While confronting traumatic memories from his past, He seeks to reconnect with the people close to him And with those observed who remain somehow distant. Feeling socially invisible, On the most patriotic week of the year, His feelings of guilt and social isolation reach a climax.

production_companies.name: The New Fund for Cinema and TV (NFCT)

title: Balcony
